about_the_game:
City of Cards takes the best aspects of City Builders and Deckbuilding Card Games, then fuses it into something completely new and innovative. Build cities, watch them thrive, respond to various exciting events, assemble your own custom deck and create your City of Cards!

Features:


Full deck customization: Mix and match different card types to make your dream city. Unlock different cards each time you play. Every building card generates a unique 3d building in your city, and every event has its own animation and effects.




Intelligent Story AI: The game has an intelligent Story Director AI that observes how you're playing and generates events to keep you entertained and on your toes. You will be able to set the difficulty of your game, for when you're in the mood to relax, or be challenged.





Build, Protect, Thrive: Build your city how you want, but you have to balance your finances, your approval rating, and your population growth. City of Cards takes the essence of your favorite genres and mixes them into something completely new, fun and innovative.
